title: "Vochi, the ‘computer vision’-based video editing and effects app, raises $1.5M seed"
excerpt: "Vochi, a startup operating out of Belarus that’s created a “computer vision”-based video editing and effects app for mobile phones, has raised $1.5 million in seed funding. Leading the round is Ukraine-based Genesis Investments (backer of BetterMe and Jiji)."
